reg_pit.title: Forestry Service Providers Compensation Fund Regulation

change.changenote: Section 1 BEFORE re-enacted by BC Reg 286/2016, effective December 7, 2016.

bcl:section.bcl:text: In this regulation, Act means the Forestry Service Providers Protection Act.

change.changenote: Section 3 was enacted by BC Reg 3/2013, effective January 18, 2013.
Section 3 (1) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 286/2016, effective December 7, 2016.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: In this section, services, in respect of forest products, means felling, bucking, yarding, skidding, processing, chipping, grinding, decking, loading, hauling, unloading, dryland sorting and logging road construction and maintenance.
